description:
Area-Based Early Recovery 
for affected Communities in South-Central Somalia

subproject.corporate outcome: Livelihoods and economic recovery generated, including infrastructure restoration, employment and sustainable income earning opportunities for crisis affected communities
subproject.description:
- Community capacities enhanced to identify and manage local economic development needs and priorities
- Community-based social, economic and productive infrastructure rehabilitated in a sustainable manner
- Short and long term employment opportunities created for skilled and unskilled Somalis
subproject.title: Area-Based Early Rec. for affe

subproject.corporate outcome: Policies, strategies and partnerships established to enhance public-private sector collaboration and private sector and market development that benefit the poor and ensure that low-income households and small enterprises have access to a broad range of financial and legal services
subproject.description:
- Community capacities enhanced to identify and manage local economic development needs and priorities
- Community-based social, economic and productive infrastructure rehabilitated in a sustainable manner
- Short and long term employment opportunities created for skilled and unskilled Somalis
subproject.title: Area-Based Early Rec. for affe

title: Area-Based Early Rec. for affected Comm in South Central
